data.description:
Welcome to our exhilarating carnival rides game!

Embark on a spine-chilling adventure aboard the Ghost Train, journeying through dark tunnels, encountering eerie surprises, and experiencing heart-pounding twists and turns.

Hop on the Happy Ride, a delightful train journey offering whimsical tours around the park. Enjoy cheerful music, colorful decorations, and create lasting memories with loved ones.

Rise above the ground on the majestic Ferris wheel, with breathtaking panoramic views of the carnival grounds and surrounding scenery. Experience tranquility and awe during the ascent, followed by a gentle sway on the way down.

Prepare for an adventure on the high seas aboard the Pirate Ship, swinging back and forth like a grand seafaring vessel. Feel the thrill of defying gravity and embrace your inner swashbuckler.

For a fast-paced experience, buckle up on the Dog Fight, a rotating ride that spins and twists in all directions. Soar through the sky, feeling the rush of wind against your face.

Lastly, brace yourself for the ultimate adrenaline rush on the Big Tower. Ascend to great heights in a secure cart, taking in awe-inspiring views of the entire carnival park. Then, plummet down at an alarming speed, experiencing a thrilling freefall that will leave you exhilarated.

Step right up, fasten your seatbelts, and get ready for the time of your life at our sensational carnival park!

changelog.change_log:
- Upgrade all textures
- Added new ride "Scramble"
- Better "Happy Ride" track
